languages.text: Стоящий неподалеку проповедник брезгливо вытирает кровь с оружия и ладоней. Кажется, бандиты приняли верующих святого Друза за легкую добычу, за что и поплатились жизнями.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Барк про то, как друзианцы перебили нападающих на жрецов бандитов

languages.text: A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.
languages.original_text: Стоящий неподалеку проповедник брезгливо вытирает кровь с оружия и ладоней. Кажется, бандиты приняли верующих святого Друза за легкую добычу, за что и поплатились жизнями.

traits.locale_text: A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping the blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.

A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.
A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.

languages.text: 近くのプリーチャーは、武器と手から血を気味悪げに拭いていた。盗賊たちは聖ドルススの信者を容易い獲物と見なしてたがために、その命で代償を払ったのであろう。
languages.original_text: A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.

traits.locale_text: 近くのプリーチャーは、武器と手から血を気味悪げに拭いていた。盗賊たちは聖ドルススの信者を容易い獲物と見なしてたがために、その命で代償を払ったのであろう。

languages.text: Près de vous, un prêcheur essuie une lame couverte de sang d'une main tremblante et tout aussi ensanglantée. Les bandits ont dû croire que les fidèles de Saint Drusus feraient des proies faciles et l'ont payé de leur vie.
languages.original_text: A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.

traits.locale_text: Près de vous, un prêcheur essuie une lame couverte de sang d'une main tremblante et tout aussi ensanglantée. Les bandits ont dû croire que les fidèles de Saint Drusus feraient des proies faciles et l'ont payé de leur vie.

languages.text: 附近的一名布道士正认认真真地地擦拭着武器与手上的血迹。那群强盗肯定是把圣德鲁苏斯的这位追随者当成了待宰的肥羊，但却付出了生命的代价。
languages.original_text: A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.

traits.locale_text: 附近的一名布道士正认认真真地地擦拭着武器与手上的血迹。那群强盗肯定是把圣德鲁苏斯的这位追随者当成了待宰的肥羊，但却付出了生命的代价。

languages.text: Ein Priester in der Nähe wischt angewidert Blut von seiner Waffe und seinen Händen. Die Banditen müssen Anhänger des Hl. Drusus für leichte Beute gehalten und ihren Irrtum mit dem Leben bezahlt haben.
languages.original_text: A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.

traits.locale_text: Ein Priester in der Nähe wischt angewidert Blut von seiner Waffe und seinen Händen. Die Banditen müssen Anhänger des Hl. Drusus für leichte Beute gehalten und ihren Irrtum mit dem Leben bezahlt haben.

languages.text: Un predicador cercano se limpia con remilgos la sangre de su arma y sus manos. Los bandidos habrían estimado que los seguidores de san Druso eran presa fácil y lo han pagado con sus vidas.
languages.original_text: A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.

traits.locale_text: Un predicador cercano se limpia con remilgos la sangre de su arma y sus manos. Los bandidos habrían estimado que los seguidores de san Druso eran presa fácil y lo han pagado con sus vidas.

languages.text: Yakınlardaki bir vaiz, silahındaki ve ellerindeki kanı titizlikle siliyor. Haydutlar, Aziz Drusus'un müritlerini kolay av olarak görmüş ve bu hatalarının karşılığını canlarıyla ödemiş.
languages.original_text: A nearby preacher is squeamishly wiping blood off his weapon and hands. The bandits must have taken followers of Saint Drusus for easy prey and paid with their lives.
